###Problem 1

```{r}
replace = function(x){
        if (class(x) == "numeric") {replace_na(x, mean(x, na.rm = TRUE))}       
        else if (class(x) == "character") {replace_na(x, "virginica")} 
                }

##apply using map

final_iris = map_df(iris_with_missing, replace)

kable(head(final_iris),format = "markdown")
```
